formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: SAY PHONETIC <string> <escape digits> Say a given character string with phonetics, returning early if any of the given DTMF digits are received on the channel. Returns 0 if playback completes without a digit pressed, the ASCII numerical value of the digit if one was pressed, or -1 on error/hangup.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -3,3 +3,4 @@ given DTMF digits are received on the channel. Returns 0 if playback completes without a digit pressed, the ASCII numerical value of the digit if one was pressed, or -1 on error/hangup. + Runs Dead : No
